definition.name: Codecov
definition.description: GitHub Action that uploads coverage reports for your repository to codecov.io
definition.author: Ibrahim Ali <@ibrahim0814> & Thomas Hu <@thomasrockhu> | Codecov

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Repository upload token - get it from codecov.io. Required only for private repositories

inputs.name: files
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of files to upload

inputs.name: directory
inputs.description: Directory to search for coverage reports.

inputs.name: flags
inputs.description: Flag upload to group coverage metrics (e.g. unittests | integration | ui,chrome)

inputs.name: commit_parent
inputs.description: The commit SHA of the parent for which you are uploading coverage. If not present, the parent will be determined using the API of your repository provider.  When using the repository providers API, the parent is determined via finding the closest ancestor to the commit.

inputs.name: dry_run
inputs.description: Don't upload files to Codecov

inputs.name: env_vars
inputs.description: Environment variables to tag the upload with (e.g. PYTHON | OS,PYTHON)

inputs.name: fail_ci_if_error
inputs.description: Specify whether or not CI build should fail if Codecov runs into an error during upload

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: Path to coverage file to upload

inputs.name: functionalities
inputs.description: Comma-separated list, see the README for options and their usage

inputs.name: move_coverage_to_trash
inputs.description: Move discovered coverage reports to the trash

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: User defined upload name. Visible in Codecov UI

inputs.name: override_branch
inputs.description: Specify the branch name

inputs.name: override_build
inputs.description: Specify the build number

inputs.name: override_commit
inputs.description: Specify the commit SHA

inputs.name: override_pr
inputs.description: Specify the pull request number

inputs.name: override_tag
inputs.description: Specify the git tag

inputs.name: os
inputs.description: Override the assumed OS. Options are alpine | linux | macos | windows.

inputs.name: root_dir
inputs.description: Used when not in git/hg project to identify project root directory

inputs.name: slug
inputs.description: Specify the slug manually (Enterprise use)

inputs.name: url
inputs.description: Change the upload host (Enterprise use)

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.description: Specify whether the Codecov output should be verbose

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: Specify which version of the Codecov Uploader should be used. Defaults to `latest`

inputs.name: working-directory
inputs.description: Directory in which to execute codecov.sh
